title: Epstein Files: Is Mira Nair's former husband Mitchell Epstein related to Jeffrey Epstein? Is Zohran Mamdani named?
summary_full: From that single line, a web of insinuation has been spun. Surnames have been confused. Family histories misread. Her son has been dragged into a narrative that has nothing to do with him. What remains, once the noise recedes, is a story far narrower and far more ordinary than the rumours suggest.
